name: Realm Rush (Malik_Dev)
description:
~ You have to save your castle from the enemy trucks that are going to destroy your castle by placing towers. 

~ Tower can be placed by pressing Right mouse button.

~  A tower building can cost 75 gold.

~ Whenever enemy truck collides with your castle you will lose 25 gold.

~ Whenever enemy truck got destroyed you will get 25 gold, as reward. 

~ You have to keep sharp eye on your gold if you lose all your gold, you will lose the game. 

                                       Good Luck...
